sentence.Network_en: These hypotheses, I contend, must be refutable in principle.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为这些假说在原则上必须是可以反驳的.

sentence.Network_en: A theory which is not refutable by any conceivable event is non - scientific.
sentence.Network_cn: 不被任何可以想见的事件驳斥的理论则不具科学性.

auth_sentence.content: Scientific theory BY DEFINITION must be duplicable, testable and refutable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Scientific theory BY DEFINITION must be duplicable, testable and refutable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Scientific theory BY DEFINITION must be duplicable, testable and refutable.

auth_sentence.content: Theories in science must be testable and refutable, God is not.
auth_sentence.res_content: Theories in science must be testable and refutable, God is not.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Theories in science must be testable and refutable, God is not.

auth_sentence.content: Science cannot include faith-based concepts because such concepts are not refutable.
